snippet.title: Let's Play: Ragnarok Online 2 - Legend of The Second
snippet.description:
I guess you could call it a let's play, no narration but shows the gameplay. I find it quite boring, just a bunch of quests and grinding, but for those who are interested, this is what it looks like and how it is played. The graphics are definitely better than GOTW and even though there are still quests, they are more interactive I think. But, still quests... 

Also shows gathering materials which is when you click on a monster which is dead and which you have looted, then you loot materials from it and this increases your profession exp. You can't do this with all monsters, but certain ones yes.

Full screen for a better view. (Will look blocky at first but bare with it and it will load the higher resolution video.)
